2.rawvalue:
Hypernumbers is about making it easy for ordinary people like you (who are not boffins) to build your own web-enabled applications and products and websites to solve your business problems. 

There is no programming involved - if you can use a spreadsheet you can build a website with hypernumbers.

If that sounds like what your business needs, tell us more about it using the following form and we will get back to you. Otherwise you can follow us on [http://twitter.com/hypernumbers][2]  for updates.


  [1]: http://hypernumbers.com/img/logo.jpg
  [2]: http://twitter.com/hypernumbers

3.rawvalue:
About Hypernumbers
==================


Hypernumbers is a startup company, based in the Central Scotland.

You can find us at [our Edinburgh office][1] situated at 34 Howe St.
  [1]: http://maps.google.co.uk/maps?hl=en&source=hp&q=34a+howe+st+edinburgh&um=1&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=34+Howe+St,+Edinburgh,+City+of+Edinburgh+EH3+6&gl=uk&ei=fj_wSrTLO-K4jAeCo9zDCA&sa=X&oi=geocode_result&ct=title&resnum=1&ved=0CA8Q8gEwAA "Hypernumber office"




Hypernumbers Ltd is registered as a company at:    Hypernumbers Ltd  
Registered Office  
135 High Street  
Linlithgow  
EH49 7EJ.
